Text.val: -- In case of new messages, store rows in MEST to enbale translations
-- add escape character (single quote), in case of single quotes exists (prevents SQL error)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select MESG_ID, MESG_MESSAGE from :1/MESG where MESG_MESSAGE like '%:2%' for fetch only
